servinfo.title: Headlight Auto Leveling Warning Light Check

s1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position.

Check that headlight auto leveling warning light (1) lights for about 2 seconds and then goes OFF. If the headlight auto leveling warning light lights up again 10 seconds after it turned off, go to Headlight Auto Leveling System Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped) . If headlight auto leveling warning light flashes, go to Initialization of Headlight Auto Leveling System .
